snippet: "I always want to grow more quickly," said one owner. But another owner issued a warning: "The unending desire to want to grow, grow, grow can derail you."
abstract: "I always want to grow more quickly," said one owner. But another owner issued a warning: "The unending desire to want to grow, grow, grow can derail you."

headline.main: Business Owners Reflect on Small Victories -- and the Dangers of Growth
